phrases: The black cloud had no proper name.
It floated over the land all alone, as if left behind.
So the people often called it Nokosaregumo, the Forsaken Cloud.
But I still want to dance
Someday, one day my passion's fire will
One day the flames would die out
Hey, I thought I did not need anything
But even now, I am so serious
I still have time to make it
Ah... but I am going to burn it up, baby
Sorry darling, it is not that easy
But surely it is not that bad either
I am going to burn it up, yeah
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
I am going to burn it up, yeah
Jeez, I am always the only one talking.
You can talk now, cannot you?
Come on, say something to me.
No, I will not let you shoot arrows at a happy bride.
Big Sis is being sent off to marry a monster.
Or I will shoot you too!
We know a thing or two about beating monsters.
A cloud right over the village.
From way back in time, it is appeared now and then to eat people up.
One time, the villagers offered a bride to keep it from eating the others.
Then it left without killing any more.
Ever since, they have offered a bride every time it comes.
If they do not offer one, it will get mad and eat up the whole village.
It is a monster but it wants a human bride?
And a lot of them, too?
Sis said it probably ate them all.
I will never understand how a monster thinks.
So your big sis was chosen this time, huh?
I have got to help her.
I do not want her to be eaten up.
This guy here has beaten up lots of monsters.
He can beat it for you.
-But it is going to cost you.
You have got a deal then.
Dororo is a funny name, too.
No it is not, it is a nice name!
Come on, say it is nice.
I told you over and over not to come!
You are actually doing this for the village?
They are using you to save themselves.
I do not want any monster eating everybody up.
I do not want you to die.
We will beat that monster for you.
That will solve all your problems.
If it eats people, it has to have a mouth and a belly.
He is all ready for it.
Let us get out of here!
Hyakkimaru's vision was surrounded by a wall of evil flame.
The dark cloud was a part of the devilish ghoul.
Hyakkimaru was enclosed in a wall of fire.
For the first time ever, he had completely lost his sight.
Big Sis are not my real sister.
I have lived alone all my life.
Papa and Mama died when I was real little.
I had the mountain with me.
They said this was not my mountain and drove me out.
Are you the boy that lives in the mountain?
You look like a saru, a monkey.
You do not remember your name?
Just watching her made me forget about hunger and cold.
Mama was the only one who would ever been kind to me.
Maybe she was my mama once sometime, in some place.
I are not got no time to cry.
I got to avenge Big Sis.
Yeah, I never leave a job half done, either.
I do not know why, but Hyakkimaru cannot do anything when he is in that cloud.
We will have to do it on our own.
Centipedes get bigger once they molt.
Is not it supposed to go home once it has a bride?
It is mad about what we did to it.
If we lure it out of the cloud, we can beat it.
Then I have got a good idea!
Size does not mean a thing.
Try to catch me with those hundred feet.
This one is for Big Sis.
It does not burn in all that fire?
Dang it, after all we did, still nothing?
Hyakkimaru had lost his sight in the wall of fire.
So he would located the monster by listening to the arrow hitting it.
What Are You going to do?
Its eye is right next to me.
This is the end for you!
There is a head on the tail, too?
I am so glad you were alive.
Here is what I promised you.
Got lots of it around here.
I only had that little bit.
Thanks to you, I am still alive.
What are you all going to do now?
We will live together in the village.
Since I am all alone, too.
Oh yes, we need to think of a new name for you.
You sound like you are really my sister.
This sense is called smell, got it?
It is the first time he said my name.
Our footsteps admonish indifference in such verbose ways
As I peek into your fathomless eyes, I lose my composure
Is there any hope in the place I am heading to?
because this road is so dark
I will be there to shine the light
I am used to playing at saying goodbye,
but I cried when I waved to you
Our fiery woes fade... and fade... until night falls upon us
If I knew tomorrow would be so mundane,
I would not have said that I wanted to live
I know it is futile but cannot help dreaming of a future... a future... you are to blame
